1.main: Do not create more than one account.
1.more: Users are allowed one account per lifetime. Do not create additional accounts under any circumstance. If your account is disabled, contact staff in #red-disabled on IRC.

2.main: Do not trade, sell, give away, or offer accounts.
2.more: If you no longer wish to use your account, send a Staff PM and request that your account be disabled. Note, we do not delete accounts.

3.more: Accounts are for personal use only. Granting access to your account in any way (e.g., shared login details, external programs) is prohibited. Invite friends and family if they wish to use the site.

1.more: You are responsible for your invitees. You will not be punished if your invitees fail to maintain required share ratios, but invitees who break golden rules or invite rules will place your invite privileges and account at risk.
